title: HALT Check-In
description: Check if you're Hungry, Angry, Lonely, or Tired - common relapse triggers

fields.label: Hungry
fields.help: Have you eaten recently? Are you physically hungry?

fields.label: Angry
fields.help: Are you feeling frustrated, resentful, or angry?

fields.label: Lonely
fields.help: Are you feeling isolated or disconnected?

fields.label: Tired
fields.help: Are you physically or emotionally exhausted?

fields.label: Action Plan
fields.help: What will you do to address these needs?
